sentences.en: A fourmasted schooner hove, in sight.
sentences.cn: 一艘四桅的纵队帆船已驶入视野内.

sentences.en: He drank a schooner of beer and became drunken.
sentences.cn: 他喝了一大酒杯啤酒后醉倒了.

sentences.en: In 1851, the schooner "America" outraced the "Aurora" off the English coast to win a trophy that became known as the America's Cup.
sentences.cn: 1851年，纵帆船“美国”号超过了英国“极光”号赢德了冠军，从此就边成了著名的美国杯！

sentences.en: The current was bearing coracle and schooner southward at an equal rate.
sentences.cn: 急流正以同样的速度将小筏子和西斯潘尼奥拉号一起冲向南方.

sentences.en: The current was coracle and schooner southward at an equal rate.
sentences.cn: 潮流以同样的速度带着大船和小艇向南滑行.

sentences.en: The high wind has made the schooner break sheer.
sentences.cn: 强风将大帆船吹离航道.

sentences.en: The wind choppedabout and blew directly toward the shore, and the schooner had to claw off.
sentences.cn: 风向转变,直往岸上吹, 那条帆船只得迎风而驶,以免靠近海岸.

sentences.en: We were schooner - rigged and rakish , with a long and lissome hull ( John Masefield )
sentences.cn: 我们的船挂有大帆,流线形, 船身长,形态优美 ( 约翰梅斯菲尔德 )

trans.tran_en: a fast sailing ship with two sails
